How the Algorithm works

Gliding ranking system is a platform to rank the skills of gliding pilots. It is based on an algorithm that evaluates the pilot's performance during each flight.

The full algorithm is based on the ELO rating but the details of the calculation are not published.

It is assigned a rank (see page rank) that varies according to the performance of the flight, to get a higher rank you must have perseverance and above all continuous training.

The goal is to motivate pilots to fly but also to determine the degree of improvement.


Only the best pilots will be able to aspire to a higher rank. The algorithm is based on a bell-shaped distrubution. The only trick is to fly, fly and talent.
